<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs=""
>
[Free and Fair](/Feats.aspx?ID=3914) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Kingdom" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=438" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 531</row>

</column>

---

Your reputation for transparency and fairness in conducting elections, appointments, and other changes in government inspires tremendous public trust. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Loyalty-based checks attempted as part of the [New Leadership](/Actions.aspx?ID=1378) and [Pledge of Fealty](/Actions.aspx?ID=1379) activities. If you fail or critically fail such a check, you can spend 2 RP to reroll the check (but without the +2 circumstance bonus); attempting this adds the [Fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76) trait. You must take the result of the second roll, even if it is worse than the original roll.
